SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.view

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.view.GameView
public class GameView extends Object
Represents the view for the game.

The GameView class class is responsible for the layout and organisation of the different UI components and game elements in the game view.

It provides methods for accessing the root panes of the application, game area, and user interface.
